body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Builder and Optimizer
  • The user can now view and add providers by provider location and by group.
  • If the user adds any provider location meeting the defined criteria, the entire group is added to the Network Model.
  • Group Names and Tax IDs will be displayed with each Provider Location.
  • More than one Group Name can be displayed for a Provider Location.
  • The Group Name is a link to the Find Providers results, where a user can choose to add the group to the Network Model.
